sentences.en: Because of a typographical error, the town of Longridge was spelt as Longbridge.
sentences.cn: 由于一个印刷上的错误，朗里奇镇的名称Longridge被拼成了Longbridge。
基于几个排印上的原因.

sentences.en: Box: Typographical term meaning rules which enclosed type matter as a frame.
sentences.cn: 线框: 印刷字体学的术语.指用线作框把字体围绕.

sentences.en: Copyright for the typographical arrangement of publications lasts for 25 years.
sentences.cn: 出版物在印刷排版方面的版权期限为25年.

sentences.en: CTQ Measure : Number of typographical mistakes.
sentences.cn: 临界质量特性名称: 印刷质量.

sentences.en: From time to time stock errors or typographical mistakes may occur.
sentences.cn: 不时股票错误或排印错误可能发生.

sentences.en: In some cases, typographical mistakes led to the collection of information on the wrong people.
sentences.cn: 在某些案件中, 印刷错误导致向错误的人收集数据.

sentences.en: In this article, a lot of clerical and typographical errors are made through confusing similar characters.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕,错误百出.

sentences.en: It means that our work should conform to a few basic rules of " typographical hygiene. "
sentences.cn: 这就是说:我们的工作应该遵守 “ 排印卫生 ” 的几条基本规则.

sentences.en: Love Typography , devoted to fonts typefaces and all things typographical.
sentences.cn: 研究关于所有字体,字形以及排版的设计.

sentences.en: My primary frustration with this book is the many typographical errors.
sentences.cn: 我最感失望的是，本书有许多的印刷错误。

sentences.en: Some are typographical or careless mistakes, but some are grammatical, stylistic , interpretation or translation mistakes.
sentences.cn: 有些是笔误,有些是注解错误, 也有些是语法错误.

sentences.en: The following typographical conventions are used to present technical material in this document.
sentences.cn: 上面这些只是一些约定俗成的东西;在实际应用中你可以使用任何你喜欢的前缀命名方法.

sentences.en: Why are small caps needed Because of several typographical reasons.
sentences.cn: 为什么会需要小型大写基于几个排印上的原因.

sentences.en: Writer must proofread work for any typographical or grammatical errors before submitting for consideration.
sentences.cn: 作家必须校对审议之前提交任何印刷或语法错误的工作.

trans.tran_en: Typographical relates to the way in which printed material is presented
